title: Russian Crude May Fall: India's Petroleum Minister
description: India’s Oil Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas Hardeep Singh Puri says he believes Canada has the potential to become one of India’s major energy suppliers. The minister also notes that India’s imports of Russian crude could continue to decline as the world’s third largest oil consumer broadens its supplier base. He speaks to Bloomberg's Menaka Doshi on the sidelines of India Energy Week in Goa. (Source: Bloomberg)
